pages.text: The $(mob)Slime$() is a monster that spawns in $(thing)Swamps$() and in rare places underground in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It moves by making sucessive jumps and deals damage on contact.$(p)It comes in different sizes and will split up into several smaller $(mob)Slimes$() on death. The smallest $(mob)Slimes$() do not deal damage.
The smallest $(mob)Slimes$() drop $(item)Slimeballs$() on death. These can be used to craft several items, like $(item)Sticky Pistons$().
